title: Leading men 's hair coloring brands in the U.S. 2019
summary: The statistic shows the sales of the leading men 's shaving cream brands in the united in 2019 . In that year , edge was the leading men 's shaving cream brand in the united with sales of about 77.6 million u.s. dollars . Additional information on the shaving cream market shaving cream is used by men in order to facilitate shaving , creating a more comfortable process and a better finish .

data.Brand: Just For Men Touch of Gray

gold: In 2019 , Just For Men was the leading men 's hair coloring brand in the United States with sales of approximately 138 million U.S. dollars . Ranked second , the Just For Men Autostop brand generated sales of around 27.2 million U.S. dollars that year .
